data.question: A _________ is something that explains the relationship between the selectors.
A ___ ______ can contain more than one simple selector. Between the simple selectors, we can include a combinator.
There are four different combinators in CSS: Give all
data.answer: descendant selector,child selector,adjacent sibling selector,general sibling selector

data.question: The ________ ______ matches all elements that are descendants of a specified element.
The _______ ____ selects all elements that are the children of a specified element.
The ______ _____ ___ selects all elements that are the adjacent siblings of a specified element.
The ______ ______ ____ selects all elements that are siblings of a specified element.
this selector is used to select the element that is the nth child, of a particular type, of its parent.
________ is used in millions of Web pages to improve the design, validate forms, detect browsers, create cookies, and much more.
is the most popular scripting language on the internet, and works in all major browsers, such as Internet Explorer, Mozilla, Firefox, Netscape, Opera.
are used to store data
is a "container" for information you want to store. A variable's value can change during the script. You can refer to a variable by name to see its value or to change its value.
